name: Wizardry Staff [2]
description: It is said that the cane was made by a Archmage. Its power is similar to the power of God.
effect: Int ＋3,[Wizardry Staff VIII] ＋ [Robe of Cast VIII] ＋ [Eye of Dullahan VIII] ＋ [Crystal Pumps IV]: －5% CT Variable, ＋3% M.Dmg, ＋3% Ignore MDef

name: Woman's Moustache
description: This collection of female beards must surely have come from a manly woman.

name: Wonderful Time Giftbox
description: A giftbox that filled with memories, all the goodies will turn into priceless loot. It will be shining as the time goes on!

name: Wooden Helmet
description: A knight's helmet made from hollowed wood can protect against minor attacks but cannot be used to cook!!

name: Wooden Mail [1]
description: The armor made from wood boards through simple treatment, only with the basic defensive power.

name: Wrapping Lace
description: Being a very rare item, it can be used to make high-end headwear.

name: Year Beast Doll
description: A Beast that been enchanted, it used to be a scary monster but now it is surprisingly cute. After putting it on, you will be save during the New Year's eve.
effect: Dmg to MVP, Mini monsters ＋6%,Dmg received from MVP, Mini monsters －6%

name: Year Loot
description: In Eastern legend, a special reward is given to those who defeat the beast that invades the village on New year's Eve. (Use it to receive a certain number of Zeny)
